system.availability: Adminstered Manually. Immediately ends all ongoing effects of drugs, toxins, or gases affecting the character, be they positive or negative. Renders the character immune to them for another 1d10 rounds.
system.cost: Astartes Grade Drugs require +10 Medicae Test if adminstered to humans, failing administers anyway but also causes 1d5 Fatigue and 1 Round of Stun.
